website_summaries.verdict: If you’re just looking for an all-around excellently made Windows touch ultrabook and don’t mind that it's on the expensive side (and doesn’t convert to a tablet), the improved Samsung Ativ Book 9 Plus is worth the investment.
pros: The Ativ Book 9 Plus laptop has a sturdy, slim design, ultra-high-res touch screen, and really good battery life
cons: Costs several hundred more than we’d prefer
doesn’t convert to a tablet form -- strictly a laptop

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but hard to beat.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a going-to-college present for son of a friend. First unit was defective and returned. The replacement unit has outlasted its warranty in the hands of a college student - what higher praise! I'm not personally much into laptops [yet], but the screen image on these Samsungs is just awesome. When I first saw how thin these units are, I bet the giftee that within 6 months (1) he'd bend and break it, or (2) it's so cool looking that it would be stolen. I lost the bet. If I ever buy something ;like these for myself, I'll start here are the standard for comparison.
customer_reviews.author: Randall Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Serious problems with the Touchpad
customer_reviews.text: This computer is very fast, which I appreciate. The super-fast start-up time is especially nice, considering how often I have to shut down or re-start the computer in order to get the touchpad to work properly. Others have already complained about the touchpad drivers, so I won't dwell on it, but this does reflect poorly on Samsung. I've been in touch with tech support, and they weren't especially helpful. They said that they updated some drivers, but the problem persists. Inexcusable in a laptop that costs this much.
customer_reviews.author: straightandnarrowfeet

customer_reviews.title: Great now that it works
customer_reviews.text: I had some serious issues with the trackpad from day 1 that resulted in my having to send this computer back to Samsung. However, now that the issue has been resolved this is a great computer. I only mention this because when I was trying to find a solution to the problem, it seemed to be a very common problem with this computer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer S

customer_reviews.title: Samsung is a very big disappointment.
customer_reviews.text: A month after purchasing this, it began freezing. Not sure what the cause is. Perhaps the 4GB RAM? I dunno. &, as others have mentioned, I feel really bad for having purchased this because I researched it on Consumer Reports & it's rated highly. I bought a Lenovo laptop 3 or 4 years ago that outperforms this. Way too much money for subpar performance. &, as others have mentioned, the Samsung customer service is DEPLORABLE! NEVER again am I gonna purchase a Samsung product. NEVER.
customer_reviews.author: Jelly Face

customer_reviews.title: Very high quality. Performs as expected with no complaints ...
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Performs as expected with no complaints. The screen is phenomenal. Feels and looks solid. Not the largest hard drive but that can be overcome. Had this product for over a year with no issues, including 7 months at sea on a ship (very durable yet very sleak and portable). Processing seems flawless and the touchscreen is very responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Brombosz

customer_reviews.title: It stands up to time better than any laptop I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for over two years. It stands up to time better than any laptop I've ever owned. It was expensive at the time, but it was well worth it. Performance has never been an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: A Good Buy
customer_reviews.text: What can you say about a tool? It either does the job or it doesn't. A laptop is supposed to do certain things, and this one so far has done everything it should. It looks great and is beautifully engineered. It's not cheap, but you usually get what you pay for. An elegantly designed, fully functional tool deserves five stars. I considered a number of other options before I bought this laptop; I think I made the right decision and recommend it highly. And, by the way, I can't find any fault with the touchscreen or with Windows 8.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald B. Keane

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Ultrabook
customer_reviews.text: I needed a computer I could use on the road and that would also be capable enough to be a desktop replacement. The ATIV Book 9 is really well designed. It has a great combination of speed and battery life. I just upgraded it to Windows 8.1 with no issues at all. The screen is truly remarkable-beautiful color and very clear. The only minor issue is the SSD leaves little space freely available. This is no issue for on the road use, but I will be adding a portable hard drive for desktop replacement use. Not the cheapest ultrabook I have seen, but I am extremely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous Geek

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful laptop
customer_reviews.text: It's a really wonderful laptop with lots of great features. I especially enjoy having the touchscreen function and that it is open 180 degrees. It's also nice having two USB 3.0 ports. While the hard drive is not as large as I would like it to be, it hasn't been too much of a problem because I have external hard drive space. I've had the laptop since it's release and I haven't run into any problems. It still runs as fast as it did in the beginning. The laptop itself is appealing in appearance and also very light so it's easy to carry around. I feel very happy with this laptop in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Lilian

customer_reviews.title: Nice, but
customer_reviews.text: Nice form factor and features for an ultrabook, but the build quality sucks. There's pretty obvious bleed-through from the backlight to the display around the edges, and the trackpad has pretty serious issues with false touch that makes the cursor jump around and randomly clicks things.
customer_reviews.author: Dan P.

customer_reviews.title: 3200X1800 screen lagging
customer_reviews.text: I upgrade windows 10. 3200x1800 screen works. But it lagging. I don't know how to fix this. From Mongolia
customer_reviews.author: ulzii

customer_reviews.title: Nice affordable ultrabook
customer_reviews.text: This is my first ultrabook, so it's hard to compare, but I like it a lot. It's very slim and has a good feel to it. It seems fast and the screen is nice and clear and easy to use. WiFi seems powerful enough. Battery life is decent. The ports on the right side are very close together so to use both the USB and HDMI at the same time, one plug has to go in at an angle. I am using this ultrabook as a desktop replacement for work and personal use. Also, I keep my sheet music on it, so I take it with me when I meet friends to play music.They all use ipads.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Broken micro HDMI port
customer_reviews.text: Great little computer for the first two months, but the micro HDMI port is already breaking. Have to wiggle it around to get a feed, only a matter of time before it breaks completely, and of course it's outside the 30 day return date. Seems like shoddy manufacturing to me.
customer_reviews.author: Radiodub

customer_reviews.title: and I am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: I have had this ATIV book 9 Plus for several weeks now and use it every day. So far the laptop has performed remarkably, and I am very happy with it. The only negative areas that I have found with it, is the touch bar and keyboard. because it doesn't always perform properly the first time, and therefore requires a second try to enter the number or letters I want. The touch bar is too sensitive and enters things when all I did was brush the touch pad with my arm or hand. However these two negatives are nothing compared to the positives this laptop has.
customer_reviews.author: William Clark

customer_reviews.title: Very sexy fully powered ultrabook
customer_reviews.text: I have not liked a piece of technology this much in a very long time. It is a fully powered ultra-book with great battery life. It does everything I hoped for and does it better than I expected. Great for work, watching videos, and even playing some games. The one negative thing I have to say about it, my headphone jack now only works sometimes. The warranty is only 1 year, and I have had this for just longer than that. This is why I rate it 4 rather than 5 stars. When it's time to buy another, I'll be looking at this line first.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn R. Sabbini

customer_reviews.title: Love it. UHD screen is just *wow*
customer_reviews.text: Love it. UHD screen is just *wow*. It's light, it's small, it's speedy and it's absolutely fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Debro

customer_reviews.title: A Big Surprise!
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews, and I wasn't happy about the price. I bought a Samsung the previous year, and I liked it a lot. Unfortunately, I tripped over its cord and busted it on the floor...or at least the hard drive. The ATIV 9 is faster, has less glitches, and has much better resolution. I'm still learning,but I think it is a winner. I have to work on the whole Windows 8.1...which will take some time.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful laptop!
customer_reviews.text: A light, very well built computer with a beautiful screen. I bought this for my wife, and she absolutely loves it. It will play videos over WiFi without a hitch, and the battery life is excellent (at least all day and into the night). It is one of the lightest around and very thin - a major plus. Samsung makes good stuff (my computer is a Samsung AMOLED tablet).
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Wardlaw

customer_reviews.title: Good product - lack of hard drive
customer_reviews.text: A very good computer, lots of update all the time, but great design and flawless workspace (mouse pad to keyboard to touchscreen). Reactivity is good even if in three weeks of use the 128Go hard drive is already full with my own files. I recommend to buy a 256Go SD card for supplement or have a bigger hard drive.
customer_reviews.author: M. Bernard et Filippi

customer_reviews.title: Love this laptop
customer_reviews.text: I loved this laptop. The design was beautiful, screen was to die for, and the battery life and weight was amazing. However, I eventually had to return it because it consistently had wifi issues. I did not know how to resolve them, which was frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Austin

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item a week ago. So far so good. I must admit the delete button is sticking a bit. While give it a week or two before I decide to return item. Keyboard lights up well at night. Touch screen very sharp. Screen should have been a mat finish as the shiny screen is a bit too much glare from your own face when working on it. Very light and compact. So far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Avril

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop on the market
customer_reviews.text: Ive had this laptop for a two weeks now. It is fast, crystal clear and very high resolution. Although the apps are not optomize yet to take full advantage of the high resolution, the app still look great as long as you zoom in. great battery life and it definitely grabs other people's attention. its sleek and lightweight design is really eye opening. definitely worth the buy!
customer_reviews.author: Johan V.

customer_reviews.title: ATIV Book 9 Does the Job
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a computer geek but I know what I need to run my business: A reliable laptop (not like my old Dell, which needed to be rebooted every morning A fast laptop (not like my old Dell, which often hung up on simple Linked In searches, for 10 minutes or more) I had heard horror tales of Windows 8.0. The Samsung came with 8.0 installed but with the option to go to 8.1. I immediately did so. There has been no big learning curve. In a word, I'm pleased with the Samsung laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Ken Reed

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, well-built machine
customer_reviews.text: Well designed with pleasing aesthetics, this is my second Samsung laptop and my first with Windows 8.1. Absolutely zero hardware issues. New OS took me some time to tweak, but if you're going to use Windows, you might as well adapt. There are plenty of customizations and adjustments that can be made to conform to your work style, but you will have to invest the energy. This is my daily work horse and it's more than capable.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: great laptop.....
customer_reviews.text: purchased this laptop after using my wife's MacBook pro for the last month and while a Mac does some things better, you can't beat the speed and versitality of this laptop. Every bit as portable and it runs iIcrosoft products the way Microsoft intented....go figure....due respect to Microsofts' attempt to have Office for Mac run as well....it doesn't. My only complaint, as many have said here before, is I wish Samsung would have installed a full size VGA port, but otherwise this laptop is exactly as advertised. Great product
customer_reviews.author: Alan Wells

customer_reviews.title: Love the sleek lines!
customer_reviews.text: Very convenient, super fast. Have changed the Windows 8 appearance of home screen. Quite light, nice screen resolution and excellent battery life. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: The adjustments needed for Windows 8.1 were difficult for the first week or two and slowed me down, but the hardware has been a perfect fit for me. I love the sleek look, light weight and touch screen for most purposes. I use a USB mouse to increase my productivity for others, as I haven't been able to adjust the pad to my liking.
customer_reviews.author: Nance L Schick

customer_reviews.title: Powerful, Lightweight and Sophisticated
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this laptop for about three weeks now. Excellent for work purposes. Light, easy to carry; sturdy, fast and sleek. For business users on the go, this is an excellent choice. Replaced my outdated 17inch Dell with this and could not be happier. Keyboard is important to me and I like the tensile feel of this as well as the spacing of the keys.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony G

customer_reviews.title: an eye-catching sleek little marvel
customer_reviews.text: fine- beautiful piece of hardware works as advertised. highest resolution (3200x1900 I believe) allows for small fonts w/o straining eyes. Fast, reliablw ans sleek. whatever imperfections this beauty has spring from microsoftˊs grotesque “innovation” they call W8. credit to the seattle gang on one count: the upgrade to 8.1 worked flawlessy - well almost, i had to fiddle with the Intel video driver a bit. all in all i am very happy
customer_reviews.author: radu tomescu1020

customer_reviews.title: The best laptop I bought so far.
customer_reviews.text: This one is the best ever laptop we bought. The screen resolution is phenomenal. The quality/build is excellent. Light and thin.
customer_reviews.author: jongbhak

customer_reviews.title: Sleek but pricey
customer_reviews.text: + Sleek, light (very slightly heavier than other Samsung 9 Series laptops due to weight of touchscren) and great battery life - Expensive compared to other brands with similar specs. Touchpad got annoying (especially when trying to left click) so I purchased an external mouse. Overall: Would buy again, knowing that I am paying more for the uber sleekness.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Ashwin Grover

customer_reviews.title: awesome....
customer_reviews.text: It's simply awesome.... I liked the way it is designed. True to the name, it's a beauty. Works as advertised. Only concern is, for the price u pay I had only 78gb of usable harddrive space on a brand new ultrabook. Wish they had a larger space hardrive for the money.... but otherwise no complaints so far....
customer_reviews.author: satya

customer_reviews.title: This Computer has all the bells and whistles
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 seventeen inch Laptops but this is our portable to take with us. Love this computer...Quality all the way
customer_reviews.author: Brian and Kim Demers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality item. I am very happy with this product. Price & quality matches.
customer_reviews.author: Aydin_Hasanzade

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop I ever bought
customer_reviews.text: Best laptop I ever bought, I love it. Far superior to any Apple product. This obviously isn't my MAIN computer (I have an 17" Alienware laptop and am building a high end gaming rig at the moment to replace the old Alienware laptop) but I use this ALL THE TIME to watch youtube or videos in bed. This laptop gets a fantastic amount of use, its fast and snappy, and I love how portable it is when travelling overseas (which I do rather regularly).
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: wow, the best laptop I have ever used; so fast, great quality, touchscreen comes in handy. thank you Santa Claus
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: perfect for
customer_reviews.text: extremely stylish, very light weight and very thin. very handy. perfect for school
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: The best laptop I ever experienced in that level
customer_reviews.text: The best laptop I ever experienced in that level. Thought a little expensive but its functionality as well as its slender design covers it. I recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Tae-Yeoub Jang

customer_reviews.title: very modern
customer_reviews.text: design, performance, size and quality is the top line products even better than Apple Mac Pro I think. thanks a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Tae-Sung Lee

customer_reviews.title: Super thin, Super fast!!
customer_reviews.text: Very light and extremely fast. Mouse pad feels a little flimsy around the edges when pressed but other than that it is a fantastic laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Sweet Ultrabook
customer_reviews.text: I am very please with this purchase and would do it again. I also have a big gaming laptop, and this one is one I can see myself getting more enjoyment out of.
customer_reviews.author: Jaron

customer_reviews.title: Takes getting familiar with, but great computer
customer_reviews.text: Small, light, but powerful. It has taken me a bit to get used to it, and I am very tech savvy, but I really like it now!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ligth and quiet
customer_reviews.text: It is very light and quiet. Overall I am very happy with this computer. It is way better than other brands like Dell. I highly recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Kal

customer_reviews.title: Love the device, still hate the OS
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking to give Windows 8 a full chance on my next machine by opting for a touchscreen laptop. So far I am very happy with the quality of the device, but I have found the OS very frustrating (as I kind of expected, but I was hoping the touch screen would change my opinion).
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: I love the machine but HATE the os
customer_reviews.text: Widows 8.1 does not work for me. I spend all my time trying to make normal functions work instead of working on projects. From the basics of email to running Photoshop I cant make anything work. I have used all versions of widows from there start. Seen the good and bad and made things work. this OS Sucks. I will be returning this super sleek and powerful laptop unless there is a widows 7 down grade for free that supports touch screen. ATIV is so sweet but OS is so bad.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sikora

customer_reviews.title: I get what I want
customer_reviews.text: Amazing ultrabook! With beautiful design outstanding colores and very comfortable keyboard,with back light, light and slim. Highly recommended. Exellent service!
customer_reviews.author: Olga

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: There's not a better ultra book out there, period. It's fast, thin, and the battery life is great! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: samuel

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Upgraded the ssd very easily. Very annoying Samsung software all over it. Why do they bother??
customer_reviews.author: Miguel E Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: the Samsung i5 ATIV is one of the best laptop computers on the market... period!
customer_reviews.text: this i5 ATIV is one of the best laptop computers on the market... period! the build quality and design is stunningly good, it blows the apple products out of the water. functionality is as expected from this i5 unit... fast... quite... and the screen is unmatched!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Schumacher

customer_reviews.title: Good Deal!!
customer_reviews.text: It's in very good condition and I am setisfied with this.
customer_reviews.author: Jung L.

customer_reviews.title: Not bad but initial quality issues
customer_reviews.text: Love the laptop, great battery life and things working very well now. As received initially, the backlit keyboard was not working and it took a 2wk delay routing through a repair house to fix it. Overall process was not that bad but certainly disappointed that it was not working on arrival. Part of the reason for the potential damage on arrival was the poor packaging done by Amazon. The laptop box was allowed to slide around inside a much larger box with no packing material, which could have contributed to the damage.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Carn

customer_reviews.title: I really liked the machine
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the machine,even the Windows 8.1 but for some reason it was impossible to register online or even talking to the foreign speaking support. Spent many hours attempting to accomplish this small,but important task. Have to say I giive Amazon 5 stars for their handling the situation.
customer_reviews.author: Nan

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop. Very portable and fast. just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Gunnar Tysklind

customer_reviews.title: i just un boxed it earlier and absolutely love it !!
customer_reviews.text: Crazy nice computer! I've spent all day with it and absolutely love it! Ive installed several software programs with ease.connected to skydrive simple and easy. Logged in to Office 365 and all is working perfectly. touch screen works really well, very fast machine here.reboots in 8 sec or so....plus it has some pretty cool features for my galaxy s 3 and note 2....this is actually amazing for us.lots of work will be done that's for sure!
customer_reviews.author: GABRIEL DOMINGUEZ

customer_reviews.title: A beautiful laptop
customer_reviews.text: This laptop met all my expectations. There was a learning curve with Windows 8.1 (I had it upgraded from 8.0 for free at the Microsoft store). There are many ways to personalize and once I used it for a few days I found it easy to use. It starts more or less instantly once to set it for not requiring a password. There are directions on the internet for stopping the password requirement.
customer_reviews.author: James T. Fowler

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I returned the item based on support and other installed program that slowed down the computer.
customer_reviews.author: NLASAW

customer_reviews.title: Wait to Buy, Support is Lacking
customer_reviews.text: The Windows 8.1 update breaks several core functionalities and the Samsung team has yet to fix it. My screen brightness is stuck at maximum and the only thing they can tell me is to "refresh" my computer back to Windows 8. Also that update came out the day I bought this computer, it's unprofessional to release products without support for an update you know is coming. Its good hardware and if it worked properly I would be very happy but until it is fixed, it is unacceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Great Labtop ( but I returned it )
customer_reviews.text: A good quality labtop. The screen is amazing best one on the market IMO. However I returned it due to some problems with the trackpad ( Multifinger swipes didn't work correctly )
customer_reviews.author: Dan K.

customer_reviews.title: Great Laptop - Hate Windows 8
customer_reviews.text: I love Samsung products and no wonder Apple is non-stop suing them for patent infringements (and Apple has lost a few battles along the way) - and this laptop is fabulous but received the 4 star review simply because of the Operating System. I HATE Windows 8 and as a result I am returning this laptop. I'm sticking with Windows 7 Pro -- and am considering doing a full removal over to MacAir because I love my IPAD. I am a lawyer and I've not done changed to Mac because all my software is Windows based....but I am sorely tempted due to Windows 8. I hope this review is helpful.
customer_reviews.author: CrossCountry

customer_reviews.title: Fans start to make clicking noise just after 10 days
customer_reviews.text: I was impressed by the highly positive reviews of this product from various tech blogs but only to find a truly disappointment. Just after 10 days' normal use, the two fans start to make a high-pitch, clicking noise, which usually only appear age-old dusty fans. Later I discovered the strength of the noise varies along with the angle the fans are wrt gravity, possibly suggesting a lousy assembly of the parts. Even my 7-year old ThinkPad is now quieter than this. Simply unacceptable for a laptop at such a premium price.
customer_reviews.author: ngukho

customer_reviews.title: Won't turn on
customer_reviews.text: Had it out of box and turned on just fine. Next day will not turn on or take power from cord.HUGE DISAPPOINTMENT - don't expect to shell out 1400 this lack of quality control and reduce speed.
customer_reviews.author: R. Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Poor Replacement for MacBook, Poor Build Quality, Windows 8.1 is Horrble
customer_reviews.text: The hardware does not hold a candle to Apple. The trackpad is finicky and doesn't respond well to gestures. The power adapter is clunky and there is no external charge indicator. The screen brightness and clarity is substandard compared to Apple. The overall build quality is just OK, not on par with Apple. Windows 8.1 is a disaster. Totally inefficient and much clunkier than Windows 7. I bought this to replace my MacBook Air, but I'm sorry I did. The software issues with the MacBook are outweighed by the superior hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Moss

customer_reviews.title: My worst laptop buy ever
customer_reviews.text: I have had this for 6 months, it has too many problems to mention. Read the negative reviews they are right. If I had to do it again I would not buy it, even if it was half the price. My worst laptop buy ever.
customer_reviews.author: S.T.

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this ultra book. It has been under 2 mos and book is now flickering on and off. Further, you are not able to upgrade anything such as ram, hard drive etc.
customer_reviews.author: Peer200x

customer_reviews.title: Box Stated US Version with Non-US Keyboard Layout
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a nice laptop, but I have to send it back because the keyboard of the item in the box is not a US standard, seems more like European or Latin American. I think it's a screw up on Samsung in the packaging, but now I'm not sure if I'll buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

product_meta.title: Samsung ATIV Book 9 Plus NP940X3G-K01US 13.3-Inch Touchscreen Laptop
product_meta.description:
Shop the Windows Store for the full selection of Windows 8 PCs




AMAZON.COM
feature_bullets: 13.3" LED QHD+, 3200 x 1800, 16:9, 10 Point Capacitive Touch Screen, Intel HD Graphics 4400

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars85 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
